content: I'm glad you provided some tips on using overdrive pedals effectively. By the way, I've had my acoustic guitar, a Yamaha FG800, for about 8 years, and it's been a great companion for songwriting and camping trips. I'm curious, do you have any recommendations on how to use effects pedals with an acoustic guitar? I've been thinking of experimenting with some pedals to add some texture to my acoustic sound.
